org.jpedal.examples.viewer.gui.javafx

Class JavaFXButtons

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.jpedal.examples.viewer.gui.javafx.JavaFXButtons
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    GUIButtons

    public class JavaFXButtons
extends Object
implements GUIButtons
    This class controls everything todo with GUIButtons, it holds the objects and their corresponding methods. To initialise the object/class call init()

      • disableUnimplementedItems

        public void disableUnimplementedItems(int ID)
        Temporary Method to Disable unimplemented Viewer Items. Edit and Remove the items from this method as we implement features. When all items have been implemented, do a search for and remove all instances of this method + the method itself.
